attributes.action: Re-investigate the Driving Laws with regards to Stopping at Zebra Crossings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More and more often, I am either nearly being run over whilst crossing on a Zebra Crossing, or witnessing near misses and accidents regarding drivers not stopping for Pedestrians who are waiting to cross, or already on the crossing, being left in the middle of the crossing whilst drivers carry on driving!
